title: Untargeted metabolomics uncovers prime pathways linked to antibacterial action of citral against bacterial vaginosis-causing Gardnerella vaginalis: An in vitro and in vivo study
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Ravi Jothi, Arumugam Kamaladevi, Pandiyan Muthuramalingam, Nambiraman Malligarjunan, Shunmugiah Karutha Pandian, Shanmugaraj Gowrishankar
